name: gubat-resilient-housing
description: A comprehensive guide for resilient housing in Gubat, providing personalized material recommendations based on location and hazards

scripts.build: echo 'Build process complete - files are ready for deployment'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating JSON files...' && node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('data/barangays.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ barangays.json is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ barangays.json is invalid:', e.message); process.exit(1); }" && node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('data/hazards.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ hazards.json is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ hazards.json is invalid:', e.message); process.exit(1); }" && node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('data/materials.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ materials.json is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ materials.json is invalid:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && eslint js/ || echo 'ESLint not available - install with: npm install -g eslint'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting code...' && prettier --write js/ css/ || echo 'Prettier not available - install with: npm install -g prettier'

author: Gubat Resilient Housing Team
